Break through the siege and retreat, regroup,"},{"lineNumber":25133,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後日に復讐戦とすべきです」","translatedEnglishLine":"and launch a revenge battle at a later date.\""},{"lineNumber":25134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":25135,"originalJapaneseLine":"将軍が言い終えても、ヨシフはしばらく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even after the general finished speaking, Yosif remained,"},{"lineNumber":25136,"originalJapaneseLine":"考え込む表情で微動だにしなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"motionless with a pensive expression for a while."},{"lineNumber":25137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いや、撤退はせぬ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, we will not retreat.\""},{"lineNumber":25138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh...!?\""},{"lineNumber":25139,"originalJapaneseLine":"おもむろに呟くと、ヨシフはやおら立ち上がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Muttering abruptly, Yosif slowly stood up."},{"lineNumber":25140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様らは何をしにここに来たのだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What have you come here to do?"},{"lineNumber":25141,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間どもに功を成さしめ、増長させるためか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it to let the humans gain achievements and grow arrogant?"},{"lineNumber":25142,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それとも臆病風に吹かれた己の無様を晒すためか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or is it to expose your own disgrace blown by cowardice?\""},{"lineNumber":25143,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どちらも違う。違うであろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Neither is true. That can't be it."},{"lineNumber":25144,"originalJapaneseLine":"　多少の不利な局面で腰が引けるような者は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who grudgingly back down in somewhat adverse situations,"},{"lineNumber":25145,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂の軍には居らぬ。そうであろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"don't exist in my army. That is so, isn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":25146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「史上にあって、無敗の軍は存在しない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In history, there is no undefeated army."},{"lineNumber":25147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最強である我々も、苦境に立つ事はあろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even we, the strongest, may face hardships."},{"lineNumber":25148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、敗北に屈する事は許さぬ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But we will never permit ourselves to succumb to defeat.\""},{"lineNumber":25149,"originalJapaneseLine":"静まりかえった司令部の中に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Within the silent command post,"},{"lineNumber":25150,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヨシフの声が朗々と響く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yosif's voice resonated clearly."},{"lineNumber":25151,"originalJapaneseLine":"「問題から逃げても意味はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Running from the problem is meaningless."},{"lineNumber":25152,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死だ。死が全ての問題を解決させるのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Death. Death will solve all problems!\""},{"lineNumber":25153,"originalJapaneseLine":"断固たる決意の籠もった声が、","translatedEnglishLine":"A voice filled with resolute determination,"},{"lineNumber":25154,"originalJapaneseLine":"テントを圧して震わせる。","translatedEnglishLine":"overwhelmed and shook the tent."},{"lineNumber":25155,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、閣下……その、死とは…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-My lord... that death you speak of is...\""},{"lineNumber":25156,"originalJapaneseLine":"恐る恐る、将軍が尋ねる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The general asked fearfully."},{"lineNumber":25157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「女王に決まっている。リーザスの女王を殺すのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It is of course the queen. We will kill the Queen of Leazas."},{"lineNumber":25158,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それで、我々の帰投は逃亡ではなく凱旋となる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, our retreat will be a triumphant return, not a flight.\""},{"lineNumber":25159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……そ、それは仰る通りな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-How... you are right...\""},{"lineNumber":25160,"originalJapaneseLine":"思いも掛けぬ、勇猛な決断だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was an unexpected and valiant decision."},{"lineNumber":25161,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヨシフの言葉でなければ、無謀と言われただろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"If not for Yosif's words, it would have been called reckless."},{"lineNumber":25162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし女王は影武者を用いているようでス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, it seems the queen is using a body double."},{"lineNumber":25163,"originalJapaneseLine":"　所在が絞りきれておりませんガ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We cannot pinpoint her exact location...\""},{"lineNumber":25164,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ならば捜せ。どのような手を使ってでもだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then search for her. By whatever means necessary!\""},

{"lineNumber":25165,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヨシフの大号令と共に、魔軍は動き出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"At Yosif's grand command, the demon army began to move."},

{"lineNumber":25166,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜が明け、翌日。","translatedEnglishLine":"Dawn broke, the next day."},

{"lineNumber":25167,"originalJapaneseLine":"払暁と共に、リーザス軍の攻勢が始まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"With daybreak, the Leazas army launched their offensive."},

{"lineNumber":25168,"originalJapaneseLine":"包囲されている状態のヨシフ軍は防戦になるが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though Yosif's army was besieged and on the defensive,"},

{"lineNumber":25169,"originalJapaneseLine":"守勢の苦手な魔軍としては異例なほど、よく耐える。","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon army, normally poor at defending, endured remarkably well."},

{"lineNumber":25170,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍は故意に包囲網の一角を手薄にし、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Leazas army deliberately left one corner of the siege thinly held,"},

{"lineNumber":25171,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこから逃亡を誘発しようとしたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"to lure an escape from there,"},

{"lineNumber":25172,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は誘われる味方を殺し、頑なに現状を維持した。","translatedEnglishLine":"but the demon army killed those tempted to flee and stubbornly held their position."},

{"lineNumber":25173,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍も無理な全面衝突よりも","translatedEnglishLine":"The Leazas army, rather than forcing a full-scale clash,"},

{"lineNumber":25174,"originalJapaneseLine":"徐々に魔軍を削る戦術を選び、","translatedEnglishLine":"chose the tactic of gradually wearing down the demon army,"},

{"lineNumber":25175,"originalJapaneseLine":"手薄な箇所を探して攻撃を仕掛けては、引いていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"attacking weak points and then retreating."},

{"lineNumber":25176,"originalJapaneseLine":"太陽が中天からやや傾きかけてきた、","translatedEnglishLine":"The sun, having passed its zenith, began to tilt slightly,"},

{"lineNumber":25177,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃合いで――","translatedEnglishLine":"around that time—"},{"lineNumber":25178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「も、申し上げます！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I report!"},{"lineNumber":25179,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お捜しの女王を見つけました！　北東の陣です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have found the queen you seek! In the northeastern camp!\""},{"lineNumber":25180,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見つけたか！　間違いないな！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You found her? Are you sure!?\""},{"lineNumber":25181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「影武者の一人を見つけ、聞き出しました！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We found one of the body doubles and interrogated her!"},{"lineNumber":25182,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その付近で捕らえた間者にも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, among the spies caught nearby,"},{"lineNumber":25183,"originalJapaneseLine":"　王族からの手紙を持つ者が！」","translatedEnglishLine":"there was one carrying a letter from the royal family!\""},{"lineNumber":25184,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よシ！　全軍、北東の陣へ突撃！！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good! All forces, charge to the northeastern camp!!"},{"lineNumber":25185,"originalJapaneseLine":"　守る必要などなイ！　……よろしいですネ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no need to defend! ...Is that understood?\""},{"lineNumber":25186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無論だ。全軍、前線へ駆けよ。お前達もだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course. All troops, hurry to the front lines. You too."},{"lineNumber":25187,"originalJapaneseLine":"　乾坤一擲の一撃を以て、我らに勝利を！」","translatedEnglishLine":"With this all-or-nothing strike, bring victory to us!\""},{"lineNumber":25188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ははぁっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah!\""},{"lineNumber":25189,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦況が動いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The course of the battle shifted."},

{"lineNumber":25190,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は半分ほどが崩れたと見せかけ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army feigned that about half of them had collapsed,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦々しく、ヨシフが反芻した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bitterly, Yosif ruminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい！　包囲を突破し撤退、態勢を立て直し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes! Break through the siege and retreat, regroup,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後日に復讐戦とすべきです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and launch a revenge battle at a later date."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍が言い終えても、ヨシフはしばらく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even after the general finished speaking, Yosif remained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考え込む表情で微動だにしなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: motionless with a pensive expression for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、撤退はせぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, we will not retreat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おもむろに呟くと、ヨシフはやおら立ち上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muttering abruptly, Yosif slowly stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様らは何をしにここに来たのだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What have you come here to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間どもに功を成さしめ、増長させるためか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it to let the humans gain achievements and grow arrogant?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも臆病風に吹かれた己の無様を晒すためか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or is it to expose your own disgrace blown by cowardice?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どちらも違う。違うであろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Neither is true. That can't be it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多少の不利な局面で腰が引けるような者は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who grudgingly back down in somewhat adverse situations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂の軍には居らぬ。そうであろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: don't exist in my army. That is so, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「史上にあって、無敗の軍は存在しない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In history, there is no undefeated army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最強である我々も、苦境に立つ事はあろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even we, the strongest, may face hardships.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、敗北に屈する事は許さぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we will never permit ourselves to succumb to defeat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 静まりかえった司令部の中に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Within the silent command post,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフの声が朗々と響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yosif's voice resonated clearly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「問題から逃げても意味はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Running from the problem is meaningless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死だ。死が全ての問題を解決させるのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Death. Death will solve all problems!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断固たる決意の籠もった声が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A voice filled with resolute determination,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テントを圧して震わせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: overwhelmed and shook the tent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「か、閣下……その、死とは…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-My lord... that death you speak of is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐る恐る、将軍が尋ねる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The general asked fearfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女王に決まっている。リーザスの女王を殺すのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is of course the queen. We will kill the Queen of Leazas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで、我々の帰投は逃亡ではなく凱旋となる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, our retreat will be a triumphant return, not a flight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は……そ、それは仰る通りな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-How... you are right..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思いも掛けぬ、勇猛な決断だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was an unexpected and valiant decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフの言葉でなければ、無謀と言われただろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If not for Yosif's words, it would have been called reckless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし女王は影武者を用いているようでス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, it seems the queen is using a body double.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 所在が絞りきれておりませんガ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cannot pinpoint her exact location..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならば捜せ。どのような手を使ってでもだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then search for her. By whatever means necessary!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフの大号令と共に、魔軍は動き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Yosif's grand command, the demon army began to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜が明け、翌日。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dawn broke, the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 払暁と共に、リーザス軍の攻勢が始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With daybreak, the Leazas army launched their offensive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 包囲されている状態のヨシフ軍は防戦になるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though Yosif's army was besieged and on the defensive,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守勢の苦手な魔軍としては異例なほど、よく耐える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army, normally poor at defending, endured remarkably well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍は故意に包囲網の一角を手薄にし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leazas army deliberately left one corner of the siege thinly held,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこから逃亡を誘発しようとしたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to lure an escape from there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は誘われる味方を殺し、頑なに現状を維持した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the demon army killed those tempted to flee and stubbornly held their position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍も無理な全面衝突よりも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leazas army, rather than forcing a full-scale clash,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徐々に魔軍を削る戦術を選び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: chose the tactic of gradually wearing down the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手薄な箇所を探して攻撃を仕掛けては、引いていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacking weak points and then retreating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 太陽が中天からやや傾きかけてきた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sun, having passed its zenith, began to tilt slightly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃合いで――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: around that time—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、申し上げます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I report!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お捜しの女王を見つけました！　北東の陣です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have found the queen you seek! In the northeastern camp!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見つけたか！　間違いないな！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You found her? Are you sure!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「影武者の一人を見つけ、聞き出しました！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We found one of the body doubles and interrogated her!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その付近で捕らえた間者にも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, among the spies caught nearby,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王族からの手紙を持つ者が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was one carrying a letter from the royal family!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よシ！　全軍、北東の陣へ突撃！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good! All forces, charge to the northeastern camp!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守る必要などなイ！　……よろしいですネ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no need to defend! ...Is that understood?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無論だ。全軍、前線へ駆けよ。お前達もだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. All troops, hurry to the front lines. You too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乾坤一擲の一撃を以て、我らに勝利を！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this all-or-nothing strike, bring victory to us!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははぁっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況が動いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The course of the battle shifted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は半分ほどが崩れたと見せかけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army feigned that about half of them had collapsed,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

{"lineNumber":25176,"originalJapaneseLine":"太陽が中天からやや傾きかけてきた、","translatedEnglishLine":"The sun, having passed its zenith, began to tilt slightly,"},

{"lineNumber":25190,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は半分ほどが崩れたと見せかけ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army feigned that about half of them had collapsed,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦々しく、ヨシフが反芻した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bitterly, Yosif ruminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい！　包囲を突破し撤退、態勢を立て直し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes! Break through the siege and retreat, regroup,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後日に復讐戦とすべきです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and launch a revenge battle at a later date."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍が言い終えても、ヨシフはしばらく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even after the general finished speaking, Yosif remained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考え込む表情で微動だにしなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: motionless with a pensive expression for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、撤退はせぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, we will not retreat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おもむろに呟くと、ヨシフはやおら立ち上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muttering abruptly, Yosif slowly stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様らは何をしにここに来たのだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What have you come here to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間どもに功を成さしめ、増長させるためか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it to let the humans gain achievements and grow arrogant?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも臆病風に吹かれた己の無様を晒すためか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or is it to expose your own disgrace blown by cowardice?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どちらも違う。違うであろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Neither is true. That can't be it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多少の不利な局面で腰が引けるような者は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who grudgingly back down in somewhat adverse situations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂の軍には居らぬ。そうであろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: don't exist in my army. That is so, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「史上にあって、無敗の軍は存在しない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In history, there is no undefeated army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最強である我々も、苦境に立つ事はあろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even we, the strongest, may face hardships.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、敗北に屈する事は許さぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we will never permit ourselves to succumb to defeat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 静まりかえった司令部の中に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Within the silent command post,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフの声が朗々と響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yosif's voice resonated clearly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「問題から逃げても意味はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Running from the problem is meaningless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死だ。死が全ての問題を解決させるのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Death. Death will solve all problems!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断固たる決意の籠もった声が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A voice filled with resolute determination,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テントを圧して震わせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: overwhelmed and shook the tent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「か、閣下……その、死とは…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-My lord... that death you speak of is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐る恐る、将軍が尋ねる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The general asked fearfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女王に決まっている。リーザスの女王を殺すのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is of course the queen. We will kill the Queen of Leazas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで、我々の帰投は逃亡ではなく凱旋となる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, our retreat will be a triumphant return, not a flight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は……そ、それは仰る通りな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-How... you are right..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思いも掛けぬ、勇猛な決断だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was an unexpected and valiant decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフの言葉でなければ、無謀と言われただろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If not for Yosif's words, it would have been called reckless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし女王は影武者を用いているようでス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, it seems the queen is using a body double.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 所在が絞りきれておりませんガ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cannot pinpoint her exact location..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならば捜せ。どのような手を使ってでもだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then search for her. By whatever means necessary!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフの大号令と共に、魔軍は動き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Yosif's grand command, the demon army began to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜が明け、翌日。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dawn broke, the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 払暁と共に、リーザス軍の攻勢が始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With daybreak, the Leazas army launched their offensive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 包囲されている状態のヨシフ軍は防戦になるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though Yosif's army was besieged and on the defensive,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守勢の苦手な魔軍としては異例なほど、よく耐える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army, normally poor at defending, endured remarkably well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍は故意に包囲網の一角を手薄にし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leazas army deliberately left one corner of the siege thinly held,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこから逃亡を誘発しようとしたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to lure an escape from there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は誘われる味方を殺し、頑なに現状を維持した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the demon army killed those tempted to flee and stubbornly held their position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍も無理な全面衝突よりも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leazas army, rather than forcing a full-scale clash,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徐々に魔軍を削る戦術を選び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: chose the tactic of gradually wearing down the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手薄な箇所を探して攻撃を仕掛けては、引いていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacking weak points and then retreating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 太陽が中天からやや傾きかけてきた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sun, having passed its zenith, began to tilt slightly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃合いで――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: around that time—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、申し上げます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I report!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お捜しの女王を見つけました！　北東の陣です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have found the queen you seek! In the northeastern camp!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見つけたか！　間違いないな！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You found her? Are you sure!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「影武者の一人を見つけ、聞き出しました！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We found one of the body doubles and interrogated her!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その付近で捕らえた間者にも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, among the spies caught nearby,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王族からの手紙を持つ者が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was one carrying a letter from the royal family!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よシ！　全軍、北東の陣へ突撃！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good! All forces, charge to the northeastern camp!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守る必要などなイ！　……よろしいですネ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no need to defend! ...Is that understood?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無論だ。全軍、前線へ駆けよ。お前達もだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. All troops, hurry to the front lines. You too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乾坤一擲の一撃を以て、我らに勝利を！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this all-or-nothing strike, bring victory to us!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははぁっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況が動いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The course of the battle shifted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は半分ほどが崩れたと見せかけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army feigned that about half of them had collapsed,
